rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
rows.translation: O you who have wrapped up in your garments!
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal muzzammil

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.arabic: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: Rise to pray in the night except a little,
rows.transliteration: qumil layla illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: Half of it, or lessen it a little,
rows.transliteration: niṣfahu awin-quṣ minhu qalīlā

rows.arabic: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
rows.translation: Or add to it, and recite the Quran as it ought to be recited.
rows.transliteration: aw zid `alayhi warattilil qur-āna tartīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
rows.translation: Surely We will make to light upon you a weighty Word.
rows.transliteration: innā sanulqī `alayka qawlan thaqīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
rows.translation: Surely the rising by night is the firmest way to tread and the best corrective of speech.
rows.transliteration: inna nāshi-atal layli hiya ashaddu waṭ-an wa-aqwamu qīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
rows.translation: Surely you have in the day time a long occupation.
rows.transliteration: inna laka fin nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlā

rows.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
rows.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with (exclusive) devotion.
rows.transliteration: wadhkuris-ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlā

rows.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
rows.translation: The Lord of the East and the West-- there is no god but He-- therefore take Him for a protector.
rows.transliteration: rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fattakhidh-hu wakīlā

rows.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
rows.translation: And bear patiently what they say and avoid them with a becoming avoidance.
rows.transliteration: waṣbir `alā mā yaqūlūna wāhjurhum hajran jamīlā

rows.arabic: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: And leave Me and the rejecters, the possessors of ease and plenty, and respite them a little.
rows.transliteration: wadharnī wal mukadhhibīna ulin na`mati wa mahhilhum qalīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
rows.translation: Surely with Us are heavy fetters and a flaming fire,
rows.transliteration: inna ladaynā ankālan wajaḥīmā

rows.arabic: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
rows.translation: And food that chokes and a painful punishment,
rows.transliteration: waṭa`āman dhā ghuṣṣatin wa`adhāban alīmā

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
rows.translation: On the day when the earth and the mountains shall quake and the mountains shall become (as) heaps of sand let loose.
rows.transliteration: yawma tarjuful-arḍu wal jibālu wakānatil jibālu kathīban mahīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
rows.translation: Surely We have sent to you an Apostle, a witness against you, as We sent an apostle to Firon.
rows.transliteration: innā arsalnā ilaykum rasūlan shāhidan `alaykum kamā arsalnā ilā fir`awna rasūlā

rows.arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
rows.translation: But Firon disobeyed the apostle, so We laid on him a violent hold.
rows.transliteration: fa`aṣā fir`awnur rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlā

rows.arabic: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
rows.translation: How, then, will you guard yourselves, if you disbelieve, on the day which shall make children grey-headed?
rows.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yaj`alul wildāna shībā

rows.arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
rows.translation: The heaven shall rend asunder thereby; His promise is ever brought to fulfillment.
rows.transliteration: as-samā-u munfaṭirun bih ۚ kāna wa`duhu maf`ūlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
rows.translation: Surely this is a reminder, then let him, who will take the way to his Lord.
rows.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkirah ۖ faman shā-at-takhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ
rows.translation: Surely your Lord knows that you pass in prayer nearly two-thirds of the night, and (sometimes) half of it, and (sometimes) a third of it, and (also) a party of those with you; and Allah measures the night and the day. He knows that you are not able to do it, so He has turned to you (mercifully), therefore read what is easy of the Quran. He knows that there must be among you sick, and others who travel in the land seeking of the bounty of Allah, and others who fight in Allah's way, therefore read as much of it as is easy (to you), and keep up prayer and pay the poor-rate and offer to Allah a goodly gift, and whatever of good you send on beforehand for yourselves, you will find it with Allah; that is best and greatest in reward; and ask forgiveness of Allah; surely Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: inna rabbaka ya`lamu annaka taqūmu adnā min thuluthayil layli waniṣfahu wathuluthahu waṭā-ifatun minal ladhīna ma`ak ۚ wallāhu yuqaddirul layla wan nahār ۚ `alima an lan tuḥṣūhu fatāba `alaykum ۖ faqra-ū mā tayassara minal qur-ān ۚ `alima an sayakūnu minkum marḍā wa-ākharūna yaḍribūna fil-arḍi yabtaghūna min faḍlillāhi wa-ākharūna yuqātilūna fī sabīlillāh ۖ faqra-ū mā tayassara minh ۚ wa-aqīmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātuz zakāta wa-aqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanā ۚ wa mā tuqaddimū li-anfusikum min khayrin tajidūhu `indallāhi huwa khayran wa-a`ẓama ajrā ۚ wastaghfirullāh ۖ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm
